The Egg Chamber.Body: "Hello! Welcome, welcome! Oh, you must be here to pick up your egg! Hmmm, ah yes, I see your name. Give me two seconds, and I'll be right back!" Soon enough, the store manager returns. "I got your egg here, but something seems to be the matter...hmm, oh dear, unfortunately, the only help I can provide is to ask the witch, she lives through the forest, she'll help you there."
The Egg Chamber.VisitedBody: "Ah I see you have returned, any progress? Please let me know if you find any solutions. For now, I'll keep looking myself." The clerk opens up a book, it seems to be about caring for eggs.

Choices.Text: Give the red Potion to the egg
Give the blue potion to the egg
Give the green potion to the egg

Feed Store.Body: You approach the Feed Supply store hoping to find some more information there. "Why hello there, my dear! Welcome to Pellets, Grain, and More! Where all your feed supplies is supplied! What can I do for you? Ah...ahuh, looking for the witch, I see, your egg is sick. Oh my, this will not do. For starters, take this." You have obtained Herbal grain. "It'll help your little pet when it hatches. As for the witch, pass through the forest, and you'll find her there. Good luck."
Feed Store.VisitedBody: Walking back into Pellats Grain and More, the shop owner greets you once more. "Welcome back, deary, I hope your little mission is going well, let me know if you need anything else!"

Flower Shop.Body: Walking down the town, you catch a whiff of a floral scent. Turning you notice a botany shop decorated in an array of colorful flowers. Strolling inside, you hear a voice muffled behind some plants. "OH, I'm so sorry I um didnt see you come in! What can I do you for? Ohhh, I see, h,m I'm sorry about that, I hope you find a cure. Errrr...here, pick any of these flowers. I know they won't help, but hopefully they bring good spirit!"
Flower Shop.VisitedBody: You decide to walk back to the Botony shop, quickly greeted by the bubbly Botonist "Oh heyo! Please feel free to let me know if you need anything!"

Blue Flower.Body: You pick up the blue flower. "Ah wonderful choice, such a calm color. Please feel free to stop by anytime."

Green Flower.Body: You pick up the Green flower. "Ah I love the color green, reminds me of all my plants! Please feel free to stop by anytime."

Red Flower.Body: You pick up the Red flower. "Ah, red, bold and fiesty, like a fiery ruby! Please feel free to stop by anytime."

Whimsical Wood.Body: Treking through the forest, the dark oaks crowd around you. A cold chill runs down your spine as you notice the path ahead branches. Where do you choose to go?

Magic Lake.Body: As the forest clears, you catch a view of the sun, glistening down onto the sparkling water. However, your peace of mind is disturbed when a voice rings out in your ears, a small whisper, something you can't make out.
Magic Lake.ItemObtained: You walk past the shimmering lake, it sparkles under the sunlight, like a crystal. You wonder if the water would be drinkable, I mean probably?

Lake Water.Body: As you approach the water, you notice a ripple. You crouch down over the edge of the land, reaching out. Do you touch the ripple?

Choices.Text: Reach out and touch the water
No way! Go deeper into the forest

Water Touched.Body: Delicately gracing the water, the ripple grows, and the glistening from the sun glows on the point where you touched the water. Reaching back, a small bubble floats up. "Hello, my child, thank you for lending me your ear. I have been watching you and wish to tell you about the young egg you are trying to save. You see that egg has suffered through much loss, even if unbeknownst to it, the poor creature has fallen from the mountains above its mother dragon, gone to humanity's torment. I wish to aid you and see this creature survive. Please save the poor thing and show it humanity's goodness." You obtained a bottle of blessed lake water.

Deep Forest.Body: The overgrown oaks now shadow the light that once shone onto the lake. The owls echo through the dark caverns of this forest. Up ahead, you notice a patch of fungi. Do you want to grab any? They couldn't be poisonous, right?
Deep Forest.ItemObtained: The overgrown oaks now shadow the light that once shone onto the lake. The owls echo through the dark caverns of this forest.

Choices.Text: Head back to the Magical Lake

Fungi.Body: You pluck a mushroom off the ground and put it into your bag. You've obtained a mushroom.

Choices.Text: Head back to the Magical Lake

Witches Shop.Body: Stepping onto the doorstep of the cabin, you notice eroding moss creeping up the outside of the walls. Bottles hang above you, tied up by rope. Before you had the chance to knock on the door, it creaks open and you're hit with the scent of herbs and blood..."Oh shoot, house, did you let someone in again." A tall woman approaches you dressed in elegant wear for the house she lives in...You greet her. "Ahhh, it's you. Let me guess, you need my help. How did I know? I know everything in this town, and that you require my assistance. Now, in order to help your little egg, I will need to brew a potion. Don't worry, this is a medicinal brew. But to do this, I will need...hmm, where did I put my book? Ah, yes, here, I need some herbal grain of some kind, a beautiful flower, Mushroom Root, and magical water. That is all I need! Get me these things and I can help you out!"
Witches Shop.VisitedBody: "Welcome back, hmmm, I see you still lack some ingredients. Remember, I need some herbal grain, a beautiful flower, a mushroom root, and magical water."
Witches Shop.ItemObtained: Stepping onto the doorstep of the cabin, you notice eroding moss creeping up the outside of the walls. Bottles hang above you, tied up by rope. Before you had the chance to knock on the door, it creaks open and you're hit with the scent of herbs and blood..."Oh shoot, house, did you let someone in again?" A tall woman approaches you dressed in elegant wear for the house she lives in...You greet her. "Ahhh, it's you. Let me guess, you need my help. How did I know? I know everything in this town, and that you require my assistance. Now, in order to help your little egg, I will need to brew a potion. Don't worry, this is a medicinal brew. Oh, I see you are quite the perceptive one. You have all the items I require, perfect."
Witches Shop.VisitedItemObtained: The door creaks open once again, but no one stands behind it. You slowly walk inside to see the Witch standing over her cauldron. "I've been expecting you, come quickly, we must hasten."

Get Red Potion.Body: You hand the witch her ingredients, and she immediately begins to brew. Adding in an ingredient at a time, the witch stirs occasionally. You stand watching for what feels like a while, but soon enough, the witch grabs a bottle and fills it up with a red liquid. "Alright, it is done. Now, take this and pour it on your little egg, it should heal up and hatch. Don't worry, I can get you to your egg. Take this door, it'll lead straight to the Egg Chamber." You thank the witch and hurry out of the cabin.

Choices.Text: Take the door straight to your egg

Get Blue Potion.Body: You hand the witch her ingredients, and she immediately begins to brew. Adding in an ingredient at a time, the witch stirs occasionally. You stand watching for what feels like a while, but soon enough, the witch grabs a bottle and fills it up with a blue liquid. "Alright, it is done. Now, take this and pour it on your little egg, it should heal up and hatch. Don't worry, I can get you to your egg. Take this door, it'll lead straight to the Egg Chamber." You thank the witch and hurry out of the cabin.

Choices.Text: Take the door straight to your egg

Get Green Potion.Body: You hand the witch her ingredients, and she immediately begins to brew. Adding in an ingredient at a time, the witch stirs occasionally. You stand watching for what feels like a while, but soon enough, the witch grabs a bottle and fills it up with a green liquid. "Alright, it is done. Now, take this and pour it on your little egg, it should heal up and hatch. Don't worry, I can get you to your egg. Take this door, it'll lead straight to the Egg Chamber." You thank the witch and hurry out of the cabin.

Choices.Text: Take the door straight to your egg

Green Potion Ending.Body: "OH, you got the witch's healing potion? Wonderful, wonderful, please do as you were instructed." Approaching the egg, you delicately opened the green liquid and poured it over the egg. Suddenly, the egg starts to glow warmly, a sage green. And soon it cracks open, revealing a green baby dragon. It looks up at you, deeming you its parent, and sneezes as plants grow around you. Congratulations, you saved your dragon and hatched a Forest Dragon.

Blue Potion Ending.Body: "OH, you got the witch's healing potion? Wonderful, wonderful, please do as you were instructed." Approaching the egg, you delicately opened the blue liquid and poured it over the egg. Suddenly, the egg starts to glow warmly, a deep blue. And soon it cracks open, revealing a blue baby dragon. It looks up at you, deeming you its parent, and runs to sit in the water bowl in the corner, trying to play in it. Congratulations, you saved your dragon and hatched a Water Dragon.

Red Potion Ending.Body: "OH, you got the witch's healing potion? Wonderful, wonderful, please do as you were instructed." Approaching the egg, you delicately opened the red liquid and poured it over the egg. Suddenly, the egg starts to glow warmly, a bright red. And soon it cracks open, revealing a fiery red baby dragon. It looks up at you, deeming you its parent, and it coughs, spitting out fire and smoke. Congratulations, you saved your dragon and hatched a Fire Dragon.
